short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase the width of the inputs in Claude AI website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expands the Claude AI chat width, making it wider and providing more area to work on. Makes text area and chat area bigger and wider. Decreases the lateral margins in Claude AI's UI, increasing the width available to the chat.
